Question: Are the shorts short or long?

Reference Answer: The shorts are long.

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/n414992.jpg

Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question='Are the shorts short or long?')
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Are the shorts short or long?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>short</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>short</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: short
